resources.string: " \t\tWELCOME! \tTo the game of Balloon Analogue Risk Task For Youth "
For each pump you get rewarded in this game. But remember, balloons pops if you pump them up too much!
If a balloon pops, you will not get the reward you have to wait for the next balloon and try Again!!
Some of these Balloons might pop after just one pump. Others might not pop until they fill the entire screen
It is up to you to decide how much to pump up each of the 30 balloons
You can stop pumping at any time by touching on the "Fill Reward Meter" button.
When the game is over, you will be able to collect a prize. Which prize you will get depends on how high your reward meter is.
There are four types of rewards you can earn: a small prize, a medium prize, a big prize and a bonus prize. Your meter will show you how much close you are to each.
Start the Balloon Game\n when you are ready.
In this game, you are asked to pump up 30 balloons
" You pump up on the balloon by touching on the "Pump" button with your finger. TRY IT!!! "
